Text:
BOZX, Thanks A Bunch!!!

I would love to seed this for all if only I can finish downloading it. Once finished, I'll be seeding it for 7 days at max Upload Speed.  If any one has any tips on how I can download quicker I'd love to hear em. The quicker I can download it, the faster your seeds will come.
Woot! Thanks for this 3D version, been waiting for it!
Seeding at 500 KB/s but only getting 175 KB/s download speed. Seed you pirates!
If I buy a 3D TV, can I play this file in 3D?  really that's all I need?  Perhaps 3D capable graphics card?
3D tv and nvidia 3d graphics card and viola

So far uploaded 29gigs. Ill keep it going for a few more days.

@partyhardy247-All you'll need is a 3d tv with glasses. No nvidia required. When playing the video just switch the tv to Side-by-Side mode and you should Good to Go.
You can get dvd burning formated English subs for Dredd at: http://www.opensubtitles.org/en/subtitles/4751941/dredd-3d-en
If you plug it straight into the tv sometimes it wont play the audio so Nvidia is the best way to go.
as I saw from screenshot there were black bars, will they be shown on tv or pc??
As I saw from screenshots there were black bars so can anyone tell me if they will be shown on tv/pc too?

Hello everyone!
I need some help!Can someone tell me a free media player which can open a 3d movie (this one for example)?I don`t have red-blue 3d glasses, I have some other sort of glasses so the RED-BLUE 3d won`t work for me.
As I saw from screenshots well there were black bars, they will be shown on tv/pc too?

you can watch these SBS movies with stereoscopic player, choose the options sbs (left or right Your choice) choose your aspect ratio start movie, it will start in the red/blue mode but on the player bar (near play,pause, etc) you will see an EYE looking icon HIT THAT! problem solved no glasses or 3d tv enjoy :)
